title: Bastard Penguins Promotional Plan
body:
In this Proposal we are gonna ask you the approval or the promotion plan. Basically, the big difference between the 2 option is about the Youtube Strategy as the Twitter Strategy will be similar in both Options, on a wider timeframe. 


Deeper explanation here:

YOUTUBE STRATEGY: We are gonna make a video (or more) about the past, present and future of the project. It will go across the Collection details, the minting, the sardines gang, the merging then $IGLOO, staking and VX. Contacting Youtubers and receive an answer it's as easy as it seems. Anyway, we did our best and we came up with 2 options:

1ST:

 3x Youtube Videos about the Project, hosted but these 3 youtubers:

1) Professor Crypto - 167k Subscribers - 3k$ - Full Video about Bastard Penguins ONLY.
https://www.youtube.com/c/ProfessorCrypto

2) Hustle Millenial - 46k Subscribers - 0.15 ETH (very very very friendly price, he's an holder) - Full Video about Bastard Penguins ONLY.
https://www.youtube.com/c/HustleMillenial

3) Crypto Wise - 30k Subscribers - 0.5 ETH - BP inserted in one of his "Hot Projects Videos"
https://www.youtube.com/c/CryptoWiseDaily/videos

IMPORTANT: This proposal could use like the 20% more of the original 1.25 ETH Budget, but as you will read in the Twitter section, 1.25 it's a good amount for the kind of promotions we can afford so also 1 ETH wouldn't be bad. We will commission the videos in different moments (not all together) and we will ask our Twitter promoters to push all of them.


2ND:

 1x Youtube Video about the Project, hosted by:

Shah - 891k YT Subscribers -  213k Followers on Twitter - BAYC #8828 Holder - 1.25 ETH.
https://twitter.com/shahh
https://www.youtube.com/c/ChronicShah

This guy is basically a gamer that just aped into NFT. Numbers are really good and our video would be one of his firsts NFT-related ones. In the case this Option will be the chosen one, a portion of our Twitter budget will be used to promote this one, and then another portion will be reserved for the future. 

 

TWITTER STRATEGY:  seen that 1.25 ETH are quite a good amount to gather many promoters, but not enough for the "BIG GUYS" (we think it wouldn't be good to have a 1 time tweet by just a single big promoter), we are gonna spread the promotions for a longer time, beyond Merging and then for the big upcoming things planned. We are always trying to get the best deals with promoters of course, asking discounts for multiple tweets on a span of time. The strategy is of course to get more promotions spending less.


Of course there will be also the option to NOT APPROVE even one of these plans.


 There are 3 options:

1) Youtube Strategy 1 + Twitter Strategy

2) Youtube Strategy 2 + Twitter Strategy

3) Not approved



HOW TO VOTE

1) Connect your Wallet and approve the digital sign (it's free) to the website. 

2) Vote for your favourite option.  You can vote for ONLY 1 option and the results will be calculated using a weighting process: the X amount of penguins and sardines you have on your connected wallet will give you X votes on the option you choose.



This Survey Proposal is up for 24h, closing 13th December 1 am CET.
author: 0x440Ef78AD85f13b214d4e99906a32a3B12123118
